name: CORE CONTROL (Blocky, cupofjoseph)
description:
Controls

  • W to open/close your guide book. A & D to flip through the 8 pages of it. Or click the book
  • Click the buttons in the instructed order to make commands to your computer system.
  • Number keys also press certain buttons to make the game more accessible for those who can't use a mouse but we recommend clicking if able.

Take control of a nuclear reactor in crisis and attempt to save it from a total meltdown! Built for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2020 Game Jam, your goal is to respond to prompts informing you which systems in the power plant need your attention. Input the correct codes to execute each command. But act quickly! if you are too slow the reactor will overheat, resulting in a meltdown! No one wants that!
